name: Macaroni In a Pot
description:
Experience the thrilling world of PRO PASTA COOKING!

Learn the secret techniques behind making mediocre Mac'n'Cheese from the comfort of your own computation device! Become a Pro at: 

  • Boiling water!
  • Grating Cheese!
  • Extreme Stir Action!

Uncover the HIDDEN DEPTHS of Macaroni, and SUFFER THE CONSEQUENCES OF YOUR RECKLESS BEHAVIOUR. 

Featuring:

  • Fully Two (2) Spatial Dimensions!
  • Novel, innovative WASD- culinary interface!
  • Thinly Veiled Metaphors!
  • High scores for people with friends who have nothing better to do!
  • One (1) unlockable secret! 
  • Post Game Content of some kind! 
  • Software bugs! 
  • Timers! Speed-run pasta cookery in a vain attempt to stave off existential dread! 
  • Approximately Five (5) Minutes of gameplay!
